thread.title: Toobin: Chaffetz Won’t Investigate Trump Because He Only Cares About Investigating Democrats
thread.title_full: Toobin: Chaffetz Won’t Investigate Trump Because He Only Cares About Investigating Democrats

author: Josh Feldman
title: Toobin: Chaffetz Won’t Investigate Trump Because He Only Cares About Investigating Democrats
text:
Toobin: Chaffetz Won’t Investigate Trump Because He Only Cares About Investigating Democrats by Josh Feldman | 8:02   video 
CNN legal analyst Jeffrey Toobin went off on House Oversight Committee Chairman Jason Chaffetz after he repeatedly insisted on CNN earlier that he’s not going to be investigating President Trump ‘s conflicts or tax returns at this point. 
Wolf Blitzer grilled Chaffetz for over ten minutes on why he’s not investigating when there are all these concerns about Trump’s conflicts and whether he’s continuing to profit from his position as the president. Chaffetz said he doesn’t want to get into a “fishing expedition” because Democrats think he should. 
Blitzer brought that interview up later in the hour and recalled Chaffetz’s answer about how it wouldn’t be appropriate to subpoena Trump’s tax returns. 
Toobin said this in response: 
“Do you think there were enough investigations of Benghazi by the Republican House?… Jason Chaffetz is only interested in investigating Democrats. Period. That’s the reason why Jason Chaffetz is in Congress, which is to investigate Democrats. He has no interest in making trouble for Donald Trump and he’s not going to make trouble for Donald Trump.” 
Watch above, via CNN.
